channel.title: Port Forwarding
channel.description:
Ive tried portforwarding and can't get it to work, I portforward fine but I still cannot connect to my server with no-ip
http://portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/Linksys/WRT54G/default.htm
that is almost the exact same router that I have, wasnt sure if that would help or not though.
I followed it and still no luck. Any suggestions?
EDIT: Alirght, i found an ip address that will connect, but when I tried to make no-ip connect to it i get an error

item.title: Port Forwarding
item.dc:creator: @runescape3 runescape3
item.description:
@runescape3 wrote:

hmmm… did you download no-ip?

and it should connect idk why it wont … i have the same kind of router i never got it to work so i broke it and it works without it (dont tell my mom lol)

Read full topic
